text:
State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 2) 2006

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

27 October 2006

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 2) 2006 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 27 October 2006.

3. Amalgamation with Department of Justice
    The part of the Department of Premier and Cabinet responsible for Industrial Relations Policy and Advocacy services is amalgamated with the Department of Justice.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 October 2006

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
